title: Danh Was Here
description: A blog by junior software engineer Danh Nguyen (NguyenDa18). Danh is from Portland, Oregon and currently works as a Software Developer at Cambia Health Solutions. Blog topics include Python, Clojure, career advice and quick notes, and personal posts.

home.title: Hi! I'm Danh.
home.description: Everyone loves an origin story. So I am using this blog to officially document my growth as a software developer. And of course for other opinions that you may find more entertaining. Thank you for taking the time to read any of my posts, or at least this bio. And as always, best wishes for achieving your goals as well. You've come a long way since you started.
